Name: Tundra Gloves
Description: The plush lining keeps your ankles very warm.

DescriptionLocalization.es: El forro de felpa mantiene los tobillos muy calientes.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 플러시 안감은 발목을 매우 따뜻하게 유지합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Das Plüschfutter hält Ihre Knöchel sehr warm.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La doublure en peluche garde vos chevilles très chaudes.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A plüss bélés nagyon melegen tartja a bokáját.
DescriptionLocalization.it: La fodera in peluche mantiene le caviglie molto calde.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 豪華な裏地はあなたの足首を非常に暖かく保ちます。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: O forro felpudo mantém seus tornozelos muito quentes.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Мягкая подкладка сохраняет тепло до щиколоток.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Peluş astar ayak bileklerinizi çok sıcak tutar.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 毛绒衬里使您的脚踝保持温暖。
